Key Match Events: India beat Pakistan by six runs in a thrilling contest.
Rishabh Pant scored 42 runs for India.
Jasprit Bumrah took 3 wickets for 14 runs.
Naseem Shah took 3 wickets for 21 runs for Pakistan.
Mohammad Rizwan scored 31 runs for Pakistan.
Post-Match Reflections: Aroom Munawar, a Pakistan fan, expressed regret about not beating India despite a low score and emphasized the need for improvement in all facets of the game.
Siyam, a Pakistan cricket fan, felt disappointed about losing despite having a small total to chase and acknowledged that India played better.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
The pitch was tricky, contributing to the low scores.
